Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This product holds immense value and significance, and I believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its worth and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exceptional deal considering its market value stands at $10,000. I trust this offer will be favorable to you and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
